Judul: Modeling light shifts in optical lattice clocks
Abstrak:
We present an extended model for the lattice-induced light shifts of the clock frequency in optical lattice
clocks, applicable to a wide range of operating conditions. The model extensions cover radial motional states with sufficient energies to invalidate the harmonic approximation of the confining potential. We reevaluate lattice-induced light shifts in our Yb optical lattice clock with an uncertainty of 6.1 × 10?18 under typical clock operating conditions.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
Sumber: PHYSICAL REVIEW A 99, 033424 (2019); ©2019 American Physical Society
